TopicTitle: How to get unlimited fuel and other stuff without having to mod

Articles.Content:
So you want to get to mun with only one rocket well i have a good invention for you it is call get smart. I think that is right no ok then here try this if your on a laptop do [alt gr F12] and it will bring a cheat menu up and you can play around with it, if your on a desktop then just do [alt F12] and there you go easy as that. Oh and one thing the take no fall damage dose not work at the moment i crashed into the mood 12 times and it didn't help at all.
have a nice day:sticktongue::):P:D

Yes, the debug menu is a thing. Be careful though, repeated use can cause dependency.

And welcome aboard!
:)i know it is just if you want to have a little fun with one rocket i don't use it all the time the planet ive gotten to is duna the cheat i use it for is to build some weared things
Hold it down for extra cheats in career.
